original_title: Pierre Verger: Mensageiro Entre Dois Mundos
overview: Inspired by the life of the french-born photographer and ethnographer, Pierre Verger, the movie follows his journey between Bahia, Brazil and Benin, Oriental Africa, showing places and people he met and his life study project: the Candomblé culture.
title: Pierre Fatumbi Verger: Messenger Between Two Worlds
